1#include "furi_hal_nfc_i.h"
2#include "furi_hal_nfc_tech_i.h"

4// Prevent FDT timer from starting
5#define FURI_HAL_NFC_FELICA_LISTENER_FDT_COMP_FC (INT32_MAX)
6
7static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_poller_init(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
8 // Enable Felica mode, AM modulation
9 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
10 handle,
11 ST25R3916_REG_MODE,
12 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_mask | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am,
13 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_felica | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am_am);
14
15 // 10% ASK modulation
16 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
17 handle,
18 ST25R3916_REG_TX_DRIVER,
19 ST25R3916_REG_TX_DRIVER_am_mod_mask,
20 ST25R3916_REG_TX_DRIVER_am_mod_10percent);
21
22 // Use regulator AM, resistive AM disabled
23 st25r3916_clear_reg_bits(
24 handle,
25 ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD,
26 ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD_dis_reg_am | ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD_res_am);
27
28 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
29 handle,
30 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE,
31 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_txrate_mask | ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_rxrate_mask,
32 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_txrate_212 | ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_rxrate_212);
33
34 // Receive configuration
35 st25r3916_write_reg(
36 handle,
37 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1,
38 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_lp0 | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_hz_12_80khz);
39
40 // Correlator setup
41 st25r3916_write_reg(
42 handle,
43 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1,
44 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s6 | ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s4 |
45 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s3);
46
47 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
48}
49
50static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_poller_deinit(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
51 UNUSED(handle);
52
53 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
54}
55
56static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_init(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
57 furi_assert(handle);
58 st25r3916_write_reg(
59 handle,
60 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL,
61 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL_en | ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL_rx_en |
62 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL_en_fd_auto_efd);
63
64 // Enable Target Felica mode, AM modulation
65 st25r3916_write_reg(
66 handle,
67 ST25R3916_REG_MODE,
68 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_targ_targ | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om2 | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am);
69
70 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
71 handle,
72 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE,
73 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_txrate_mask | ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_rxrate_mask,
74 ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_txrate_212 | ST25R3916_REG_BIT_RATE_rxrate_212);
75
76 // Receive configuration
77 st25r3916_write_reg(
78 handle,
79 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1,
80 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_lp0 | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_hz_12_80khz);
81
82 // AGC enabled, ratio 3:1, squelch after TX
83 st25r3916_write_reg(
84 handle,
85 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2,
86 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc6_3 | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc_m |
87 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc_en | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_sqm_dyn);
88 // HF operation, full gain on AM and PM channels
89 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF3, 0x00);
90 // No gain reduction on AM and PM channels
91 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF4, 0x00);
92 // 10% ASK modulation
93 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_TX_DRIVER, ST25R3916_REG_TX_DRIVER_am_mod_10percent);
94
95 // Correlator setup
96 st25r3916_write_reg(
97 handle,
98 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1,
99 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s6 | ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s4 |
100 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s2);
101
102 // Sleep mode disable, 424kHz mode off
103 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF2, 0x00);
104
105 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_MASK_RX_TIMER, 0x02);
106
107 st25r3916_direct_cmd(handle, ST25R3916_CMD_STOP);
108 uint32_t interrupts =
109 (ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_FWL | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_TXE | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_RXS |
110 ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_RXE | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_PAR | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_CRC |
111 ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_ERR1 | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_ERR2 | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_NRE |
112 ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_EON | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_EOF | ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_WU_A_X |
113 ST25R3916_IRQ_MASK_WU_A);
114 // Clear interrupts
115 st25r3916_get_irq(handle);
116
117 st25r3916_write_reg(
118 handle,
119 ST25R3916_REG_PASSIVE_TARGET,
120 ST25R3916_REG_PASSIVE_TARGET_d_106_ac_a | ST25R3916_REG_PASSIVE_TARGET_d_ac_ap2p |
121 ST25R3916_REG_PASSIVE_TARGET_fdel_1);
122 // Enable interrupts
123 st25r3916_mask_irq(handle, ~interrupts);
124 st25r3916_direct_cmd(handle, ST25R3916_CMD_GOTO_SENSE);
125
126 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
127}

129static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_deinit(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
130 UNUSED(handle);
131 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
132}

134static FuriHalNfcEvent furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_wait_event(uint32_t timeout_ms) {
135 UNUSED(timeout_ms);
136 FuriHalNfcEvent event = furi_hal_nfc_wait_event_common(timeout_ms);
137
138 return event;
139}

141FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_tx(
142 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle,
143 const uint8_t* tx_data,
144 size_t tx_bits) {
145 UNUSED(handle);
146 UNUSED(tx_data);
147 UNUSED(tx_bits);
148 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;

160
161FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_set_sensf_res_data(
162 const uint8_t* idm,
163 const uint8_t idm_len,
164 const uint8_t* pmm,
165 const uint8_t pmm_len) {
166 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle = &furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_nfc;
167 // Write PT Memory
168 uint8_t pt_memory[19] = {};
169 pt_memory[2] = 0x01;
170 memcpy(pt_memory + 3, idm, idm_len);
171 memcpy(pt_memory + 3 + idm_len, pmm, pmm_len);
172 st25r3916_write_ptf_mem(handle, pt_memory, sizeof(pt_memory));
173 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
174}
175
176const FuriHalNfcTechBase furi_hal_nfc_felica = {
177 .poller =
178 {
179 .compensation =
180 {
181 .fdt = FURI_HAL_NFC_POLLER_FDT_COMP_FC,
182 .fwt = FURI_HAL_NFC_POLLER_FWT_COMP_FC,
183 },
184 .init = furi_hal_nfc_felica_poller_init,
185 .deinit = furi_hal_nfc_felica_poller_deinit,
186 .wait_event = furi_hal_nfc_wait_event_common,
187 .tx = furi_hal_nfc_poller_tx_common,
188 .rx = furi_hal_nfc_common_fifo_rx,
189 },
190
191 .listener =
192 {
193 .compensation =
194 {
195 .fdt = FURI_HAL_NFC_FELICA_LISTENER_FDT_COMP_FC,
196 },
197 .init = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_init,
198 .deinit = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_deinit,
199 .wait_event = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_wait_event,
200 .tx = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_tx,
201 .rx = furi_hal_nfc_common_fifo_rx,
202 .sleep = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_sleep,
203 .idle = furi_hal_nfc_felica_listener_idle,
204 },
205};
